title: Conference Board's Franco on the June CCI Report (Audio)
itunes:title: Conference Board's Franco on the June CCI Report (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Lynn Franco, Director of Economic Indicators with the Conference Board, on the June Consumer Confidence (CCI) report.
